step-destination.title: Destination
step-destination.enter-failed: Failed to refresh cloud foundry data. Please try again. If this error persists, please contact the Administrator.

branch.placeholder: Branch name will decrease clone time

source.file: Select a source or drag and drop a GitHub url or an archive file
source.folder: Select a source or drag and drop a GitHub url, an archive file or folder

folder.label: Local archive file or folder
folder.prompt: Choose a local file or folder

manifest.label: Manifest
manifest.description: For existing apps, if the relative path to your manifest.yml is not in the root please supply it below.
manifest.path-placeholder: Relative path of manifest to root of app directory

step-deploying.title: Deploy Application
step-deploying.submit-failed: Failed to deploy application. If this error persists, please contact the Administrator. Reason: {{reason}}.

event-type.CLOSE_FAILED_NO_BRANCH: Failed to clone repository (no branch supplied), please ensure git details are correct
event-type.CLOSE_FAILED_CLONE: Failed to clone repository, please ensure git details are correct and try again
event-type.CLOSE_FAILURE: Unknown failure. See log for more information.
event-type.CLOSE_PUSH_ERROR: [[@:cloud-foundry]] push unsuccessful. See log for details.
